function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with low-cost interventions","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Increase awareness through targeted educational programs and incentives for compliance","Technologies":"None specified","People":"General population, especially in developing countries","Owner":"Health ministries, NGOs, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Ineffective evaluation of global and resource-intensive measures","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness for contagious disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive evaluation frameworks for screening and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Data analytics, AI for predictive modeling","People":"Health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited capability for long-term maintenance of strict hygiene and barrier routines","Impact":"Risk of outbreaks in environments with low motivation and resources","Mitigation":"Provide ongoing support, training, and resources for sustainable hygiene practices","Technologies":"Mobile apps for hygiene reminders, remote training platforms","People":"Institutions, public facilities, communities","Owner":"Health organizations, local authorities"}]}
